com.day.cq.wcm.mobile.core.impl.MobileEm.README: Indicate which page resource types should display the mobile emulators.

org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.override..description: sscp Override Configs for global configuration service

repoinit:TEXT|true: # Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentAuthors_PRD group
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /etc
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var
# Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_AAAF_ContentAuthors_PRD group
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /etc
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var
# Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentApprovers_PRD group
# Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_AAAF_ContentApprovers_PRD group
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var
# Create group & Set Permissions to ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_LegalApprovers_PRD group
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var
# Create group & Set Permissions to ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_Admin_PRD group
# these users and ACLs are only necessary on author
create service user acs-commons-package-replication-status-event-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user sscp-system with path /home/users/system
create service user aem-vite-clientlibs with path /home/users/system
# These paths must exist otherwise the following ACL applicaiton will fail, resulting in err'ing build
# create default contextual configuration for redirects: /conf/global/settings/redirects
# user to invalidate cached redirects on change
create service user acs-commons-manage-redirects-service with path system/acs-aem-commons
# Marketo config service needs to be able to read /conf and /content
create service user acs-commons-marketo-conf-service with path system/acs-commons
# web requests need read access to redirect configurations, e.g. /conf/global/settings/redirects
create service user acs-commons-automatic-package-replicator-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-file-fetch-service with path system/acs-aem-commons
create service user acs-commons-remote-assets-service with path system/acs-aem-commons
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, crx:replicate on /content/cq:tags
allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, crx:replicate on /content/dam
# If /etc/tags is used, these ACLs be set manually - if RepoInit defines this structure, it supersedes the use of /content/cq:tags
# allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, crx:replicate on /etc/tags
create service user acs-commons-dispatcher-flush-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-ensure-service-user-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-on-deploy-scripts-service with path system/acs-commons
# these users and ACLs are only necessary on author
create service user acs-commons-workflow-remover-service with path system/acs-commons
# the path may not yet exist in AEMaaCS as it is created lazily
create service user acs-commons-workflowpackagemanager-service with path system/acs-commons
# the path may not yet exist in AEMaaCS as it is created lazily
create service user acs-commons-ensure-oak-index-service with path system/acs-commons
<< [cq:PageContent] > cq:OwnerTaggable, cq:ReplicationStatus, mix:created, mix:title, nt:unstructured, sling:Resource, sling:VanityPath
<< [cq:PageContent] > cq:OwnerTaggable, cq:ReplicationStatus, mix:created, mix:title, nt:unstructured, sling:Resource, sling:VanityPath
create service user acs-commons-bulk-workflow-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-shared-component-props-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-review-task-asset-mover-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-twitter-updater-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-remote-assets-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-form-helper-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-manage-redirects-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-email-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-httpcache-jcr-storage-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-component-error-handler-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-manage-controlled-processes-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-error-page-handler-service with path system/acs-commons
create service user acs-commons-system-notifications-service with path system/acs-commons
